fc = 1/(2πRC) >Passes high frequencies >

C >
fc = 1/(2πRC) >Passes low frequencies >
Tuning & Timing Circuits
>
LC Tank Circuit
>
L >
C >
f₀ = 1/(2π√LC)
>Oscillates at resonant frequency >Used in radio tuning >
RC Timing Circuit

R >

V
>
τ = RC
>Exponential charge/discharge >Timer circuits, delays >
Capacitor Selection Guide
> Coupling/Blocking: >0.1F - 10F, low ESR
>Bypass/Decoupling: >0.01F - 1F, ceramic
>Power Supply: >100F - 10,000F, electrolytic
>Timing: >1nF - 1000F, low leakage
>RF Tuning: >1pF - 1nF, variable >
